verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Standing in thy presence Lord
Waiting on Thee
Thou shalt renew my strength
For thou has promised me

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For Thou hast promised me my Lord
Thou hast promised me
My strength shall be renewed
As I wait As I wait
O Lord on thee

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
If I abide in thee my Lord
And thy word abides in me
I'll ask what I will and it shall be done
For thou has promised me
